gov.medicaid.controllers

Class BaseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.medicaid.controllers.BaseController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnrollmentController, EnrollmentPageFlowController, ForgotPasswordController, LandingController, MyProfileController, OnboardingController, ProviderDashboardController, SelfRegistrationController

    @Controller
public abstract class BaseController
extends java.lang.Object
    A base controller class that other classes will extend that provides logging.

    Thread Safety This class is mutable and not thread safe, but used in thread safe manner by framework.
